titles.title: A bill to make permanent the temporary exemption from duty of the cost of certain foreign repairs made to United States vessels.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S2023)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/24/1993--Introduced. Amends the Customs and Trade Act of 1990 to make permanent the temporary exemption from duty of the cost of certain foreign repairs made to U.S. vessels.
